alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN YAZOO AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM CST... At 745 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Myrleville, or 14 miles southeast of Yazoo City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Myrleville around 750 PM CST. Canton and Way around 755 PM CST. Vaughan around 800 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central Mississippi.
